title: Offline Mode - Cached Content
body: You are currently offline. This is cached content from your last visit. Some features may not be available until you reconnect to the internet.

title: Service Worker Active
body: The Progressive Web App is working in offline mode. Your data is being served from the local cache to provide a seamless experience.

title: Reconnect for Fresh Data
body: To get the latest content and full functionality, please check your internet connection and try refreshing the page when you're back online.
